headline: Lenox Advisors Named Again to 2025 Top Financial Security Professionals Best-in-State List by Forbes and SHOOK Research
summary: Lenox Advisors, Inc., an affiliate of NFP, an Aon company, proudly announced that 27 of its financial professionals have been named to the 2025 Forbes/SHOOK Research Top Financial Security Professionals Best-in-State List. This prestigious honor recognizes advisors who provide outstanding client service, specializing in tailored investment solutions and risk management strategies such as life insurance, long-term disability, long-term care, and annuities.

headline: Aon fired employee with ADHD who wanted to work in the office full time, lawsuit alleges
summary: The employee claimed she couldn’t perform at an optimal level when she worked remotely due to her ADHD.

raw.headline: Aon fired employee with ADHD who wanted to work in the office full time, lawsuit alleges

headline: Aon registers 11% rise in Q2 revenue
summary: For the quarter ended 30 June, the company’s attributable net income rose by 10% to $579m (£431.49m).
